r.d: Modyllic, PHP SQL Parser and schema management tool
r.n: * Add IF EXISTS to events. Fixes #93. * Stop using 5.3 Exception form and just rethrow non-general errors * RETURNS COLUMN assertions should allow empty result sets (#56) * Implement support for extended inserts (#88) * Fix missing is_primary attribute on columns * Improve error messages for invalid delimiters (#82)
